app.incompatible: Peach requires a newer app version. Functionality might be restricted. Please update your app.
welcome.welcomeToPeach.title: Welcome to peach
welcome.welcomeToPeach.description.1: Buy bitcoin the way you want:
welcome.welcomeToPeach.description.2: with or without ID, from other people or from companies
welcome.peachOfMind.title: Peach of mind
welcome.peachOfMind.description.1: As long as you play fair, we’ll guarantee you get your bitcoin.
welcome.youOwnYourData.title: You own your data
welcome.youOwnYourData.description.1: Your account lives on your phone, not our servers.
welcome.letsGetStarted.title: Let’s get started!
newUser.description.1: All your account info is stored locally & encrypted.
newUser.description.2: You just need to make a password:
restoreBackup.autoScan.description.1: We’ll look for the backup file in the default directory.
restoreBackup.manual.description.1: Select your Peach account backup file
restoreBackup.decrypt.description.1: Your backup is password encrypted. Please type in your account password.
restoreBackup.restored.description.1: We restored your backup. Let’s continue your Peer to Peer journey!
sell.title: Sell bitcoin
sell.subtitle: How much do you want to sell?
offer.summary.subtitle: Summary
sell.currencies: Which currencies do you want to accept?
sell.paymentMethods: How would you like to be paid?
sell.escrow.subtitle: Fund escrow
escrow.help.title: Peach escrow
escrow.help.description.intro: The amount you send here consists of:
escrow.help.description.1: 1. The amount of sats you’re selling
sell.escrow.returnAddress.title: What's your return address?
sell.escrow.returnAddress.subtitle: (just in case you need a refund)
buy.title: Buy bitcoin
buy.subtitle: How much do you want to buy?
buy.currencies: How would you like to pay?
buy.kyc: Do you want to accept offers that require KYC?

iDontHaveAWallet.title: TODO
search.searchingForAPeer: Peach is searching for a peer
search.weWillNotifyYou: We’ll notify you when we’ve found a match!
search.matchAsManyAsYouWant.1: You can match as many offers as you want!
search.matchAsManyAsYouWant.2: A trade will be created with the first seller who matches you back.
search.error.paymentDataMissing: Payment Data is missing on your offer. Please insert your payment data.
offers.title: Offers
offers.noOffers: You have not created any offers yet.
offers.search.title: Searching for a peer
offers.search.sell.subtitle: sell offer for $0 sats
offers.search.buy.subtitle: buy offer for $0 sats
offers.offerCanceled.subtitle: offer canceled
offers.offerCompleted.subtitle: offer completed $0
offers.tradeCanceled.subtitle: trade canceled
cancelOffer.confirm.title: Are you sure you want to cancel this offer?
form.password.error: Your password should be at least 8 characters long
form.password.invalid: The password you entered is invalid. Account cannot be decrypted.
error.general: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact the peach support-team.
error.createAccount: Something went wrong creating the account. Please try again later or contact the peach support-team.
error.ERROR_SAVE_ACCOUNT: Something went wrong saving the account. Please try restarting the app or contact the peach support-team.
error.postOffer: Something went wrong posting your offer. Please try again later or contact the peach support-team.
error.createEscrow: Something went wrong while creating your escrow address. Please try again later or contact the peach support-team.
error.INVALID_AMOUNT: Refund amount is not expected value. Please verify the displayed amount or contact the peach support-team.
error.INVALID_INPUT: Transaction input is invalid. Please contact the peach support-team.
error.RETURN_ADDRESS_MISMATCH: Return address does not match expected value. Please contact the peach support-team.
error.releaseAddressMismatch: Release address does not match expected value. Please contact the peach support-team.
refund.WRONG_FUNDING_AMOUNT.title: Escrow not funded
refund.WRONG_FUNDING_AMOUNT.description: Unfortunately, you sent the wrong amount to the escrow.
refund.WRONG_FUNDING_AMOUNT.refund: We will refund you the entire amount (minus transaction fees) so you can attempt the funding again.
refund.CANCELED.title: Refund escrow
refund.CANCELED.refund: We will refund you the entire amount minus transaction fees.
contract.subtitle: accepted offer for $0 sats
rate.subtitle: How would you rate your trade partner?
tradeComplete.title.seller.default: Made some money just like that
AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE: Could not authenticate. You can only register one account on your device.
NETWORK_ERROR: There has been a problem with your connection to the peach server. Please try again later or contact the peach support-team.
UNAUTHORIZED: You don't have permission to view this content.
TRADING_LIMIT_REACHED: Your trading limit has been reached.
CANNOT_DOUBLEMATCH: You cannot double match an offer that hasn't match with yours first. The counterparty has likely just retracted their offer.
matchAccepted.title: Match accepted!
matchAccepted.description: A seller has accepted one of your matches. You should pay the offer within 12 hours of accepting.
paymentMade.title: Payment made!
paymentMade.description: The buyer has made the payment for trade $0.
settings.title: Settings
contact.title: Contact peach
contact.reason.question: I have a question
report.title: Report issue
report.success.title: Report sent!
report.success.text.1: We’ll normally be in touch within 24 hours on workdays.
